name: craftify
description: Web app to build no-code / low-code web applications

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run service:web:dev" "npm run service:build:dev"
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run frontend:build" "npm run service:web:build" "npm run service:build:build"
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run service:web:start" "npm run service:build:start"
scripts.frontend:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run dev --prefix frontend
scripts.frontend:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.service:web:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run dev --prefix backend/services/web-service
scripts.service:web:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build --prefix backend/services/web-service
scripts.service:web:start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run start --prefix backend/services/web-service
scripts.service:build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run dev --prefix backend/services/build-service
scripts.service:build:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build --prefix backend/services/build-service
scripts.service:build:start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run start --prefix backend/services/build-service

author: Francisco Carmona Guerrero
